items.content_html: The Smart To-Do List Application is a lightweight, user-friendly task management system designed to help users organize and prioritize their daily activities efficiently. Built with a clean interface and responsive design, this application ensures a seamless experience across devices, making task tracking simple and intuitive.

items.content_html: A lightweight Web3 learning platform combining bite-sized lessons (5-10 mins) with a decentralized currency knowledge hub. Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.

Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.

items.content_html: LiteBot is a minimal, multilingual chatbot built entirely with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript â€” no backend, no APIs, no frameworks. It supports both Turkish and English, offers dark mode, sound notifications, and fully local scripted responses via JSON. Ideal for personal sites, demos, or lightweight integrations where simplicity and speed matter most.

items.content_html: Lumen Note is a lightweight web app designed for quick and efficient note-taking. It features a simple and clean user interface, allowing users to easily add, delete, and search notes. The app uses a backend database to store and manage notes securely, ensuring fast access and persistence across sessions.
